<table border="1" cellspacing="0">

<tr> <td id="ncd:taxonCoverage" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* ncd:taxonCoverage </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/CollectiontaxonCoverage </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Taxon Coverage </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Core - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * No</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">A higher taxon (e.g., a genus, family, or order) at the level of the genus or higher, that covers all taxa that are the primary subject of the resource (which may be a media item or a collection). </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="dwc:scientificName" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dwc:scientificName </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/scientificName </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Taxon Name </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Core - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">Taxon names of organisms represented in the media resource (with date and authorship information if available) of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be applied. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> dwc:scientificName </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="dwc:identificationQualifier" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dwc:identificationQualifier </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/identificationQualifier </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Identification Qualifier </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Core - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">A brief phrase or a standard abbreviation ("cf. genus", "cf. species", "cf. var.", "aff. species", etc.) to express the determiner's doubts with respect to a specified taxonomic rank about the identification given in Scientific Name. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> dwc:identificationQualifier </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="dwc:vernacularName" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dwc:vernacularName </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/vernacularName </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Common Name </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Core - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">Common (= vernacular) names of the subject in one or several languages. The ISO language name should be given in parentheses after the name if not all names are in Metadata Language. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> dwc:vernacularName </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="dwc:nameAccordingTo" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dwc:nameAccordingTo </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/nameAccordingTo </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Name According To </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Extended - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">The taxonomic authority used to apply the name to the taxon, e. g., a book or web service from which the name comes from. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> dwc:nameAccordingTo </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="dwc:taxonID" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dwc:taxonID </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/taxonID </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Scientific Name GUID </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Extended - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">Equivalent to Scientific Name, but using GUIDs such as http URIs or LSIDs to refer to the taxon names or concepts. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> dwc:taxonID </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="scientificNameSynonym" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* scientificNameSynonym </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/ac/terms/scientificNameSynonym </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Scientific Name Synonym </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Extended - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">One or several scientific names that are synonyms to the Scientific Name may be provided here. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="dwc:identifiedBy" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dwc:identifiedBy </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/identifiedBy </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Identified By </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Extended - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">The name(s) of the person(s) who applied the Scientific Name to the sample. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> dwc:identifiedBy </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="dwc:dateIdentified" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dwc:dateIdentified </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/dateIdentified </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Date Identified </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Extended - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * No</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">The date on which the person(s) given under Identfied By applied a Scientific Name to the resource. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> dwc:dateIndentified </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="taxonCount" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* taxonCount </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/ac/terms/taxonCount </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Taxon Count </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Core - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * No</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">An exact or estimated number of taxa at the lowest applicable taxon rank (usually species or infraspecific) represented by the media resource (item or collection). </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="subjectPart" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* subjectPart </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/ac/terms/subjectPart </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Subject Part </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Extended - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">The portion of the organism, environment, etc. shown or particularly well illustrated. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="dwc:sex" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dwc:sex </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/sex </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Subject Sex </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Extended - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">A description of the sex of any organisms featured within the media, when relevant to the subject of the media, e. g., male, female, hermaphrodite, dioecious. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="dwc:lifeStage" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dwc:lifeStage </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/lifeStage </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Subject Life Stage </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Extended - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">A description of the life-cycle stage of any organisms featured within the media, when relevant to the subject of the media, e. g., larvae, juvenile, adult. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> dwc:lifeStage </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>

<tr> <td id="subjectOrientation" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* subjectOrientation </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://rs.tdwg.org/ac/terms/subjectOrientation </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Subject Orientation </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Extended - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * Yes</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">Specific orientiation (= direction, view angle) of the subject represented in the media resource with respect to the acquisition device. </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Details:* </td> <td> </td> </tr> <tr height="16" border="0"><td colspan="2" border="0" > </td></tr>
